item.name: Chain Bridge->Reopen Bridged RFI and verify

exec: pm.test("Share attribute is true in the response", function () {

request.description:
### POST /v3/projects/{{ProjectAId}}/rfis/{{CBrfiId}}/bridge

This endpoint is used to perform an HTTP POST request to bridge RFIs between projects.

#### Request Body

- Raw request body type
    
    - targetProjectIds (array of strings, required): An array of project IDs to which the RFI will be bridged.
        

#### Response (400 - Bad Request)

The response for this request is in the form of a JSON schema:

``` json
{
  "title": "",
  "details": [
    {
      "code": "",
      "errors": [
        {
          "code": "",
          "params": [""],
          "message": "",
          "path": [],
          "description": ""
        }
      ],
      "in": "",
      "message": "",
      "name": "",
      "path": [""]
    }
  ],
  "detail": [
    {
      "code": "",
      "errors": [
        {
          "code": "",
          "params": [""],
          "message": "",
          "path": [],
          "description": ""
        }
      ],
      "in": "",
      "message": "",
      "name": "",
      "path": [""]
    }
  ]
}

 ```

This response indicates a 400 Bad Request status with a JSON schema containing error details.

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl --request POST \
  --url https://platform.stoplight.autodesk.com/mocks/root/rfis-service/929366/v3/projects/projectId/search:rfis \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer 123' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-user-id: ' \
  --data '{
  "limit": 10,
  "offset": 0,
  "search": "string",
  "sort": [
    {
      "field": "createdAt",
      "order": "DESC",
      "subField": "e908815a-22e1-45cc-a0e2-5d5e43dc18f4"
    }
  ],
  "filter": {
    "status": [
      "draft",
      "submitted",
      "open",
      "openRev1",
      "openRev2",
      "answered",
      "answeredRev1",
      "answeredManager",
      "closed"
    ],
    "officialResponseStatus": [
      "answered",
      "rejected"
    ],
    "includeHidden": false,
    "assignedTo": [
      "string"
    ],
    "locations": [
      "string"
    ],
    "createdAt": "string",
    "closedAt": "string",
    "createdBy": [
      "string"
    ],
    "dueDate": "string",
    "costImpact": [
      "Yes"
    ],
    "scheduleImpact": [
      "Yes"
    ],
    "priority": [
      "High"
    ],
    "id": [
      "string"
    ],
    "reference": "string",
    "discipline": [
      "Building Management System"
    ],
    "category": [
      "Code Compliance"
    ],
    "customAttributes": {},
    "rfiTypeId": [
      "string"
    ],
    "bridgedSource": true,
    "bridgedTarget": true
  },
  "fields": [
    "id",
    "customIdentifier",
    "title",
    "question",
    "status",
    "assignedTo",
    "dueDate",
    "locationDescription",
    "locations",
    "officialResponse",
    "officialResponseStatus",
    "officialResponseActors",
    "respondedAt",
    "respondedBy",
    "createdBy",
    "createdAt",
    "updatedBy",
    "updatedAt",
    "closedAt",
    "closedBy",
    "containerId",
    "suggestedAnswer",
    "coReviewers",
    "watchers",
    "answeredAt",
    "answeredBy",
    "costImpact",
    "scheduleImpact",
    "priority",
    "discipline",
    "category",
    "reference",
    "sheetMetadata",
    "attachmentsCount",
    "commentsCount",
    "managerId",
    "constructionManagerId",
    "architects",
    "reviewers",
    "rfiTypeId",
    "bridgedSource",
    "bridgedTarget",
    "bridgeSyncOutdated"
  ]
}'
